definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: The tongue is one of the vocal organs.
Furthermore, syllable counts give no direct evidence of the rate at which articulatory organs move.
sentences.chinese: 此外，音節數並不能直接顯示發音器官移動的速度。

sentences.english: They must be taught how to use their speech organs.
sentences.chinese: 必須教他們如何使用發音器官。

sentences.english: The bird has specialized vocal apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 這隻鳥有特殊的發音器官。
